title: Gifting Skins
body: I was wondering about how gifting skins work. Like if I have Tempest Janna (Which is unavailable in shop at the moment), can I gift someone that skin if they have the champion Janna. Another question, if I have Ahri and someone has Challenger Ahri can they gift me Challenger Ahri or would I hafts obtain it via Mystery Skin (if Challenger Ahri is available via Mystery Skin).

replies.body: I believe that you can only get skins that are available at the time of gifting.
i don't believe locked vault skins are available via mystery gifts, if i was riot i wouldn't do that, they make a killing when they re-release skins 2-3 times a year :)

Vault skins are available for mystery gifting, just good luck getting the 1 skin that you actually want.

Also if you own a skin not available you can't just gift that skin to someone, that isn't how it works, or it would be really easy to get rare skins.
